content:
This code chunk is a method within the LerpNodePathInterval class, which handles node path interpolation and animations in Panda3D. The privDoEvent method is used to initialize shear parameters during interval setup. It demonstrates how transformation properties like shear are set up in the animation system for smooth transitions.

def privDoEvent(self, t, event):
        # This function is only used if Python functors were passed in
        # for some of the input parameters.
        if self.paramSetup and event == CInterval.ETInitialize:
            self.setupParam(self.setEndShear, self.endShear)
            self.setupParam(self.setStartShear, self.startShear)
        LerpNodePathInterval.privDoEvent(self, t, event)
